Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
phys::ActorBaseThis is the base class from which all the actors inherit
phys::ActorContainerBaseA base class to unify the interface for different kinds of containers for holding actors
phys::ActorContainerVectorA simple Actor Container using a vector
phys::ActorGraphicsSettingsThis is a helper class for configuring graphics settings of an actor
phys::ActorRigidThis is the actor class for Rigid Objects
phys::ActorSoftThis is the actor class for Soft Objects
phys::ActorTerrainThis is actor class for terrain
phys::AreaEffectThis class is used to define area's in the world that have unique effects
phys::AttachableThis is just a base class to be used by elements that are attachable to worldnodes
phys::xml::AttributeA light-weight handle for manipulating attributes in DOM tree
phys::xml::AttributeIteratorAttribute iterator (a bidirectional iterator over a collection of Attribute)
AttributeStructThe internal data storage structure used in an Attribute
phys::UI::ButtonThis class is a helper class, specifically for use as a button
phys::UI::ButtonCallbackThis class provides customizable functionality to the button class
phys::UI::ButtonListBoxThis is a widget for displaying a list of buttons in a box
phys::CameraThis is the camera class
phys::CameraManagerThis is the manager class for all camera functions
phys::UI::CaptionThis class is a helper class, specifically for use with text
phys::UI::CheckBoxThis is a simple widget for storing a bool value
phys::ColourValueThis is a simple class for holding 4 reals representing the colour any give object or lightsource can have
phys::xml::DocumentThe root node of any xml hierarchy is a Document Node
phys::EventBaseThe base class for all events
phys::EventCollisionThis is an event class used to track collsions in the physics world
phys::EventGameWindowThis is intended to convey the message that quitting needs to happen
phys::EventGameWindowDataUsed to keep private in one place that is actually private
phys::EventManagerThis is a container for Events and facilitates the transfer of data
phys::internal::EventManagerInternalDataUsed to increase encapsulation, just a bit
phys::EventQuitThis is intended to convey the message that quitting needs to happen
phys::EventRenderTimeThis communicates the amount of time since the world was rendered
phys::EventUserInputThis is a container for MetaCodes that is used in the physEventManager
phys::ExceptionThis is the exception thrown by most physgame system that can throw exceptions
phys::ExtendedTimerAn enhanced timer class that can store and track many units of time
phys::GameWindowThis class is for creating and managing game windows
phys::GraphicsManagerThis is intended to store basic graphics setting for the user
phys::GraphicsSettingsThis stores all the possible configuration options the graphics manager supports
phys::GravityFieldThis is a gravity field implementation of the AreaEffect class
phys::GravityWellThis is a gravity well implementation of the AreaEffect class
phys::InputQueryToolThis provides a number of utilities for getting input information
phys::debug::InternalDebugDrawerThis is used to draw wireframse for the Physics subsystem
phys::LightThis class is the class used for dynamic lighting within the scene
phys::internal::Line3DDoes the bulk of the work that that the phys::LineGroup performs
phys::LineGroupThis is a group of consectutive line segments to be rendered together
phys::UI::LineListThis is an object comprised of a series of lines
phys::UI::ListBoxThis is a widget for displaying a list of captions in a box
phys::ManagerBaseThis is the base class from which all the World Managers inherit
phys::UI::MarkupTextThis is a helper class for use with specialized text display
phys::UI::MenuThis class is a control mechanism for multiple windows in a heirarchy
phys::UI::MenuWindowThis class is an extended version of the window class for use exclusively with the menu widget
phys::MeshGeneratorThis class allows the creation of graphical meshes from code
phys::MetaCodeThis Determines the kind of user input
phys::xml::NodeA light-weight handle for manipulating nodes in DOM tree
phys::xml::NodeIteratorChild node iterator (a bidirectional iterator over a collection of Node)
NodeStructThe internal data storage structure used in a Node
phys::ObjectReferenceThis is a small class used to store a reference to a world object
phys::xml::ParseResultAll the information needed to troubleshoot a Parsing error
phys::ParticleEffectThis class is responsible for creating visual particle effects, such as rain, smoke, sparks, and explosions
phys::PhysicsManagerThis is simply a place for storing all the Physics Related functions
phys::PlaneThis is used to represent a flat infinite slice of the game world
phys::QuaternionThis is used to store information about rotation in 3d space
phys::RayThis is used to indicate a line with one end
phys::UI::RectangleThis class is a helper class, specifically for use with background sprites and colours
phys::UI::ResizingInfo< T >This is a helper struct for use in resizing UI containers
phys::ResourceInputStreamA stream from a file, can read from zip files as well
phys::ResourceManagerThis is the manager responsible for the loading and unloading of files
phys::SceneManagerThis class contains utilities and functions to allow the manipulation of the Graphical scene, rather then the physics inside, or the object inside
phys::UI::ScrollbarThis class is a widget class, to be used alongside any scrollable widget
phys::SimpleTimerA basic timer class that can be used to track short intervals of time
phys::SoundThis is an instance of a sound that can be played and manipulated
phys::SoundListenerThis is the listener class used for 3D sound
phys::SoundManagerThis is simply a place for storing all the Sound utilities and functions
phys::TestAEThis is a dummy class to test if the AE field works. Details will be output to the log
phys::UI::TextButtonThis is a button class that provides text capabilities
phys::TimeA container for the metrics of time relevant for the timer class
phys::TimerA base timer class for the different timers
phys::TimerCallbackA callback class for use automated and timed-event based timers
phys::TimerManagerA manager responsible for the updating of all timers in use by this engine
phys::xml::TreeWalkerUsed to call a function for_each member of the subtree of nodes descended from a specific node
phys::UILayerThis class is the basic container class for UI elements
phys::UIManagerThis class is responsible for any and all user interactions with the User interface/HUD
phys::UIScreenThis class is a helper class for creating UI's. It is responsible for storing and keeping track of all the elements of a single UI screen
phys::Vector2This is used to represent a point on a 2 dimentional area, such as a screen
phys::Vector3This is used to represent a point in space, or a vector through space
phys::Vector3WActorThis class is used to store or transfer a position relative to an Actor
phys::ViewportThis class is for creating and managing viewports within a game window
phys::UI::WidgetThis class is the base class for all widgets
phys::UI::WindowThis is a container widget capable of holding any other widget
phys::WorldThis is the main entry point for the entire library
phys::WorldGetSetA simple set of function to manage a pointer to the gameworld
phys::WorldNodeThis is a helper class which non-physics objects, such as lights, cameras, ribbon trails, and particle effects may be attached to for enhanced effects
phys::WorldQueryToolThis provides a number of optional tools for working with a phys::World
phys::xml::WriterInterface for node printing (see Node::Print)
phys::xml::WriterFileAn implementation of Writer intended for writing to FILEs as defined in stdio
phys::xml::WriterStreamAn implementation of Writer intended for writing std::ostreams
phys::xml::XPathExceptionThrown in a variety of XPath only situations, to indicate type mismatch or other issues
phys::xml::XPathNodeAn XPath node which can store handles to a xml::Node or an xml::Attribute
phys::xml::XPathNodeSetA collection of nodes that an XPathQuery can work on
phys::xml::XPathParseResultXPath parsing result
phys::xml::XPathQueryA compiled XPath query object
phys::xml::XPathVariableA single XPath variable
phys::xml::XPathVariableSetA set of XPath variables
